scripts.swagger:regenerate: node -e "const port=process.env.PORT||5000; const url=process.env.API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:'+port; console.log('Regenerating docs at: '+url); require('child_process').exec('curl -X POST '+url+'/api-docs/regenerate', (e,o)=>console.log(o||e))"
scripts.docs: node -r dotenv/config -e "const port=process.env.PORT||5000; const url=process.env.API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:'+port; console.log('ðŸ“– Open '+url+'/api-docs to view API documentation')"
